code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import PokemonService from'../services/pokemon-service';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PokemonSearch=()=>{const[term,setTerm]=useState('');const[pokemons,setPokemons]=useState([]);const handleInputChange=e=>{const term=e.target.value;setTerm(term);if(term.length<=1){setPokemons([]);return;}PokemonService.searchPokemon(term).then(pokemons=>setPokemons(pokemons));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col s12 m6 offset-m3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"input-field",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Rechercher un pok\xE9mon",value:term,onChange:e=>handleInputChange(e)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"collection",children:pokemons.map(pokemon=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/pokemons/".concat(pokemon.id),className:"collection-item",children:pokemon.name},pokemon.id))})]})})})});};export default PokemonSearch;
